constituent: benevolence, Nelson, column, going, line, stethoscope, camel, ten, needle, eye, cross-eyed, net, heart
heisigStory: Going . . . needle . . . eye . . . heart. Refer back now to the note in frame 890.
koohiiStory1: Hearkening back to the kanji for LISTEN... Benevolence is a good listener who is willing to go the distance to help.
koohiiStory2: In a rare act of benevolence, the Sparten column removes the needle from the cyclops´s eye, and he repays them by eating their hearts.
myStory: chữ đức. đi chậm có mười mắt trong tim.
